mapper.select: select count(*) from seller_info where si_id=#{id}
select count(*) from seller_info where si_email=#{email}
select count(*) from seller_info where si_id=#{id} and si_pwd=#{pwd}
select sum(a.pc_count)as pc_count,pi_name from product_count a inner join product_info b on a.pc_pi_seq = b.pi_seq where a.pc_si_seq=#{si_seq} group by a.pc_pi_seq order by pc_count desc
select sum(a.pc_count)as pc_count,pi_name from product_count a inner join product_info b on a.pc_pi_seq = b.pi_seq where a.pc_si_seq=#{si_seq} group by a.pc_pi_seq order by pc_count desc limit 5;

select si_seq,rev_reg_dt,rev_mod_dt,rev_rate,pi_name,pi_price,rev_content,mi_id from member_info a inner join (select * from seller_info a inner join (select * from review a inner join product_info b on a.rev_pi_seq = b.pi_seq )b on a.si_seq = b.pi_si_seq) b on a.mi_seq = b.rev_mi_seq where si_seq=#{si_seq} order by rev_reg_dt desc limit 10;
